column2: "Good work. Your report is excellent. It looks like you've gotten the hang of the wand."
"You have a solid foundation now, so you can continue to learn."
"You can keep that wand. I hope you enjoy it."
"See you later. Don't let me find out you haven't been practicing with your wand."

"A new Client Order is available for Barbara.

Barbara can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
